item.title: Ani add a quote by Salvador Dali
item.description: "Have no fear of perfection - you'll never reach it." -- Salvador Dali

item.title: Ani add a quote by Salvador Dali
item.description: "At the age of six I wanted to be a cook. At seven I wanted to be Napoleon. And my ambition has been growing steadily ever since." -- Salvador Dali

item.title: Ani add a quote by Salvador Dalí
item.description: "There are some days when I think I'm going to die from an overdose of satisfaction." -- Salvador Dalí

item.title: Ani add a quote by Salvador Dali
item.description: "The only difference between me and a madman is I'm not mad." -- Salvador Dali

item.title: Ani add a quote by Salvador Dali
item.description: "Drawing is the honesty of the art. There is no possibility of cheating: It is either good or bad. " -- Salvador Dali

item.title: Ani add a quote by Pablo Neruda
item.description: "I love you without knowing how, or when, or from where. I love you simply, without problems or pride: I love you in this way because I do not know any other way of loving but this, in which there is no I or you, so intimate that your hand upon my chest is my hand, so intimate that when I fall asleep your eyes close." -- Pablo Neruda

item.title: Ani add a quote by Pablo Neruda
item.description: "I crave your mouth, your voice, your hair. Silent and starving, I prowl through the streets. Bread does not nourish me, dawn disrupts me, all day I hunt for the liquid measure of your steps." -- Pablo Neruda

item.title: Ani add a quote by Pablo Neruda
item.description: "Sucede que me canso de ser hombre." -- Pablo Neruda

item.title: Ani add a quote by Pablo Neruda
item.description:
"Quiero que sepas una cosa.
Si de pronto me olvidas no me busques, que ya te habré olvidado." -- Pablo Neruda

item.title: Ani add a quote by Phillip C. McGraw
item.description: "At the end of the day, whether or not those people are comfortable with how you're living your life doesn't matter. What matters is whether you're comfortable with it." -- Phillip C. McGraw

item.title: Ani add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "To love oneself is the beginning of a lifelong romance." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Ani add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Ani add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Ani add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Ani add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Ani add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Ani add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "No one can make you feel inferior without your consent." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Ani add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Ani add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Ani add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Ani add a quote by Maurice Switzer
item.description: "It is better to remain silent at the risk of being thought a fool, than to talk and remove all doubt of it." -- Maurice Switzer

item.title: Ani add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Ani add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "The man who does not read has no advantage over the man who cannot read." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Ani add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: Ani add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Ani add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Ani add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Ani add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "You can never be overdressed or overeducated." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Ani add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "If one cannot enjoy reading a book over and over again, there is no use in reading it at all." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Ani add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "The truth is rarely pure and never simple." -- Oscar Wilde
